title: Fear
description: Sometimes life leads you in a direction you never expected. Ryan Parker knows this better than most. When his parents are murdered, he makes the decision to become a police officer to find the killer and avenge his parents. Little does he know that the murderer has other ideas. He will stop at nothing to keep Ryan miserable and alone. Can Ryan stop his tormentor, or will the killer get what he wanted the whole time?
author: Adrianne Lemke
